auth.form.reset-password.email-prompt: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.form.reset-password.email-sent: An email has been sent to you with instructions on how to reset your password, please check your inbox and click the link provided.
auth.form.reset-password.success: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now login with your new password.
auth.register.success.title: Thank you for registering! We've sent a verification email to the address you provided. Please check your email and click on the verification link to activate your account.
auth.register.success.description: If you haven't received the email, please check your spam folder. You can also click the button below to resend the email.
auth.error.email-invalid: Please enter a valid email address
auth.error.email-password-username-requi: Email, password, and username are required
auth.error.keep-logged-in-required: Keep logged in selection is required
auth.error.password-missing-character: Must contain an uppercase letter, lowercase letter, and a number
auth.error.google-auth-not-supported: This option is not available for Google accounts
auth.error.password-changed-too-recently: Password was changed too recently, please try again later
app.general.check-inbox: If you don't receive an email within a few minutes, please check your spam folder. If you still can't find the email, please try sending it again.
app.general.upload-image: Click to upload or drag and drop
app.general.register-to-create-recipe: Only registered users can create recipes
app.general.shopping-list-tooltip-anonym: Shopping list is available only for registered users
app.shopping-list.delete-recipe-shopping: Are you sure you want to delete this recipe from the shopping list?
app.shopping-list.trash-description: Items moved to the trash will be deleted after saving changes.
app.recipe.title: Recipe title
app.recipe.create-shopping-list-descript: Click on individual ingredients in the list above to mark those you already have at home. From the remaining ones, you can create a shopping list by clicking the button below.
app.recipe.unsaved-changes-warning: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave this page?
app.recipe.search-suggestions.title: Search suggestions
app.recipe.search-suggestions.empty: Enter a recipe name, ingredient, or instruction
app.recipe.search-suggestions.empty-last: Start browsing recipes and this will show your last viewed
app.form.image-cropper.title: Edit image
app.form.image-cropper.description: Edit the image to the desired size.
app.error.not-found.description: The content you are looking for does not exist.
app.error.restricted: You are not authorized to access this page
app.error.restricted.description: This page is for registered users only. Please login to continue.
app.error.restricted.contact-admin: Please contact the administrator if you believe this is an error.
app.error.too-many-requests.description: You are doing this too often. Please try again later.
app.error.invalid-image-format: Please upload a valid image file
app.error.image-size-too-large: Image is too large. Please upload an image that is less than {{maxSize}}MB
app.error.image-dimensions-too-large: Image dimensions are too large. Please upload an image that is less than {{maxWidth}}x{{maxHeight}} px
app.error.conflict: Conflict â€“ this action could not be completed
app.error.infrastructure: Service temporarily unavailable, please try again later
